text: kya toone us par bhee nazar na daalee ki jo kuchh rooe zameen mein hai sabako khuda hee ne tumhaare qaaboo mein kar diya hai aur kashtee ko (bhee) jo usake hukm se dariya mein chalatee hai aur vahee to aasamaan ko roke hue hai ki zameen par na gir pade magar (jab) usaka hukm hoga (to gir padega) isamen shak nahin ki khuda logon par bada meharabaan va rahamavaala hai
